additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Fragrance, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Sodium Benzoate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-47, Sodium Hydroxide, CI 19140, CI 14700

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. In case of any discomfort, please discontinue and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.

description: Ogx Renewing + Repairing & Shine Argan Oil Of Morocco Conditioner For Dry & Damaged Hair
